ai-tha-ap66:1.1_0: A bully creates a human broad.
ai-tha-ap66:1.4_0: who doesn’t be inspired by him,
ai-tha-ap66:2.4_0: who doesn’t be inspired by him,
ai-tha-ap66:3.1_0: laid down as it really is,
ai-tha-ap66:3.2_0: like a fancy cooked in a charnel ground,
ai-tha-ap66:3.3_0: So too, when the Buddha-will still had
ai-tha-ap66:3.4_0: who doesn’t be inspired by him,
ai-tha-ap66:4.3_0: there is the knowledge of the Buddha
ai-tha-ap66:4.4_0: who doesn’t be inspired by him,
ai-tha-ap66:5.2_0: Only brahmins are better for a brahmin,
ai-tha-ap66:5.4_0: their own psychic powers are fulfilled,
ai-tha-ap66:6.4_0: you’ll make an end to you.
ai-tha-ap66:7.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap66:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap66:10.1_0: That is how these verses of others:
ai-tha-ap66:11.1_0: to the fourth part of the Elders, the Lord of the World,
